thread.title: NYX Gaming Group Ltd launches NYX OGS™ games ahead of schedule to customers of recently acquired Chartwell and Cryptologic
thread.title_full: NYX Gaming Group Ltd launches NYX OGS™ games ahead of schedule to customers of recently acquired Chartwell and Cryptologic - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: NYX Gaming Group Ltd launches NYX OGS™ games ahead of schedule to customers of recently acquired Chartwell and Cryptologic
text:
NYX Gaming Group Ltd.
Corbett Sports the first to launch with NextGen Gaming's Gorilla Go Wild
LAS VEGAS, NV , Sept. 9, 2015 /CNW Telbec/ - NYX Gaming Group Limited (TSXV: NYX) ("NYX Gaming Group"), a market leading content and technology supplier to lotteries, casinos and gaming operators across the globe, is today excited to announce that its proprietary NYX OGS ™ system and associated content is available to Chartwell & CryptoLogic customers. This significant games roll-out materializes after NYX Gaming Group's recent acquisition of Amaya ( Alberta ) Inc., formerly Chartwell Technology Inc. ("Chartwell") and CryptoLogic Limited ("CryptoLogic" and together with Chartwell, the "B2B Business"). The availability of NYX OGS™ games to Chartwell & CryptoLogic CGS operators is evidence of the excellent integration effort of the new business and further proves the concrete demand for NYX Gaming Group supplied content to leading, regulated B2C providers worldwide.
For Operators this advance means the widest choice of in-house and third party authored casino content in the market available via a single integration. For suppliers, access to an even wider range of regulated Operator partners who are able to license content without any additional technical effort on their part, regardless if they take OGS™ delivered content direct, or via CGS.
Corbett Sports are the first beneficiaries having today launched NextGen Gaming's smash Gorilla Go Wild slot. Peter Macdonald , Chief Operations Officer at Corbett Sports said "We are excited to be live to market with NYX's premium and proven gaming content, and to be leveraging this opportunity seamlessly delivered by NYX OGS™ into our existing CGS integration. We look forward to working with many of the quality third party suppliers this latest development opportunity offers."
Matt Davey , CEO at NYX Gaming Group said "The completion of this pivotal integration is testiment to the strategic thinking behind the acquisition of the Amaya B2B business and the dedication of the NYX Gaming Group team. The availability of NYX OGS™ content to CGS operators further cements NYX's leading position as one of the largest content and systems suppliers in the regulated iGaming market."
Today's release further justifies NYX Gaming Group's recent award of Innovation In Slot Provision at 2015's EGR B2B Awards, which recognized the group's breadth of distribution opportunities, speed of integration and premium content delivery.
